name: Passport to Dangerpur: Rise of the Narasimha
name_original: Passport to Dangerpur: Rise of the Narasimha
description:
A terrible game made for a terrible inside joke.

Based on the sequel to the hit Bollywood film Passport to Dangerpur 4: Wrath from Bengal Bay, Guljaram Punjabikir lays dead. The two remaining goons, Jodha Khan and Kisan Gonzalez, must now collect all his left behind chakra and head to Kolkata in an attempt to get their friend back. Take control of fan favorites like Jodha Khan and his magical powers and Kisan Gonzalez and his legendary battle suit to save Guljaram Punjabikir!

I will never update this ever again. I don't ever want to think about this project ever again.

Music and Audio by: Celestialghost, NENE, Ted Kerr, Cleyton Kauffman, Juhanu Junkala, TAD, Wyver9, Viktor Kraus, and Megupets. All found on Opengameart.org.

Controls:

Arrow keys = Movement and direction of shooting.

Space = Jump

Z = Select/Shoot

X= Change to Kisan Gonzalez (After Stage 2)

C= Change to Jodha Khan (After Stage 2)
